hero.title: Reveal the Meaning
hero.description: Discover hidden meanings through AI-powered dream interpretation, personalized horoscopes, and mystical tarot readings.

interactive.title: Choose Your Mystical Path
interactive.meowModeTooltip: Meow mode activates a fluffy fortune-telling cat: it purrs, hisses, and predicts fate with a tailed character.
interactive.atmosphereModeTooltip: Enables mystical background music to create an atmosphere of ancient rituals and magical practices.

dailyBoost.title: Daily Boost
dailyBoost.description: Start your day with a positive affirmation, energy check-in, and friendly motivation.
dailyBoost.placeholder: Tell me something to get my day started...

askAnything.title: Ask Anything
askAnything.description: Get advice or insights on relationships, work, emotions, beauty, or anything personal.
askAnything.placeholder: Ask a question about relationships, work, or something personal...

styleGuide.title: Style Guide
styleGuide.description: Outfit suggestions based on mood, occasion, or season. Option to upload a photo.
styleGuide.placeholder: I need an outfit for a first date...

heartTalk.title: Heart Talk
heartTalk.description: Vent, journal, or reflect. The AI listens, asks gentle questions, and offers comfort.
heartTalk.placeholder: I need to talk about something that's on my mind...

glowUpPlan.title: Glow Up Plan
glowUpPlan.description: A personalized weekly plan for self-care, beauty, fitness, and mindset.
glowUpPlan.placeholder: Create a glow-up plan for me for next week...

teaGossip.title: Tea & Gossip
teaGossip.description: Fun, light-hearted mode: trending topics, celeb gossip, memes, quizzes, and more.

whatToWear.title: What to wear
whatToWear.description: Get a style suggestion based on the weather, occasion, or your mood.
whatToWear.placeholder: I'm going to a wedding, help me with a look...

loadingMessages: Listening to what the Universe whispers...
Cleaning the mirror of the future...
Searching for answer in dusty archives of Fate...

modal.signUpDescription: Create an account to continue chatting with AI
modal.signInDescription: Sign in to your account to continue
modal.switchToSignIn: Already have an account? Sign In
modal.switchToSignUp: Don't have an account? Sign Up
modal.terms: By signing up, you agree to our terms of service and privacy policy.
